title: JPMorgan Chase is giving its employees an AI assistant powered by ChatGPT maker OpenAI
content: The move by JPMorgan, the largest U.S. bank by assets, shows how quickly generative AI has swept through America since the arrival of ChatGPT in late 2022.
summary: The move by JPMorgan, the largest U.S. bank by assets, shows how quickly generative AI has swept through America since the arrival of ChatGPT in late 2022.

title: Online disinformation sparked a wave of far-right violence in the UK — here's how
content: It didn't take long for false claims to appear on social media after three young girls were killed in the British town of Southport in July.
summary: It didn't take long for false claims to appear on social media after three young girls were killed in the British town of Southport in July.

title: Ukraine unleashes large drone attack on Russian airfield as Kyiv's offensive continues
content: Ukrainian drones struck a key military airfield in Russia's Lipetsk region, as Kyiv continues its largest offensive on Russian soil since the start of the war.
summary: Ukrainian drones struck a key military airfield in Russia's Lipetsk region, as Kyiv continues its largest offensive on Russian soil since the start of the war.

title: Maduro orders 10-day ban on Elon Musk's X in Venezuela after feud with billionaire
content: Contested Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro ordered a 10-day ban on X, cutting off locals' access to the platform after a feud with Elon Musk.
summary: Contested Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro ordered a 10-day ban on X, cutting off locals' access to the platform after a feud with Elon Musk.

title: Harris erases Trump's lead on economy among younger Americans, CNBC/Generation Lab survey finds
content: VP Kamala Harris has a 12 point lead over Donald Trump among younger Americans, who also trust her to help the economy, new CNBC Generation Lab survey finds.
summary: VP Kamala Harris has a 12 point lead over Donald Trump among younger Americans, who also trust her to help the economy, new CNBC Generation Lab survey finds.

title: Container explodes on cargo ship at China's key Ningbo port
content: A hazardous goods container exploded Friday on a ship operating in China's Ningbo Port, vessel owner Yang Ming told CNBC in a statement.
summary: A hazardous goods container exploded Friday on a ship operating in China's Ningbo Port, vessel owner Yang Ming told CNBC in a statement.

title: SoftBank-backed Indian EV startup Ola Electric pops 20% on debut valuing firm at $4.8 billion

summary: Shares of Ola Electric surged 20% on their market debut as investors bet the company is set to become a key player in India's EV industry.

title: China will have nearly twice as many pets as young children by 2030, Goldman Sachs says
content: The country's urban pet population is set to hit over 70 million by the end of the decade, while the number of children under the age of four will dwindle to less than 40 million.
summary: The country's urban pet population is set to hit over 70 million by the end of the decade, while the number of children under the age of four will dwindle to less than 40 million.

title: UK investment platform Hargreaves Lansdown agrees to $6.9 billion takeover by CVC consortium
content: Hargreaves Lansdown, the U.K.'s biggest stockbroker, said it had agreed to $6.94 billion by a consortium including CVC Capital Partners.
summary: Hargreaves Lansdown, the U.K.'s biggest stockbroker, said it had agreed to $6.94 billion by a consortium including CVC Capital Partners.

title: 10-year Treasury yield dips as traders weigh state of U.S. economy after latest data
content: U.S. Treasury yields were slightly lower early Friday as investors continue to assess weekly jobless claims data.

title: China's consumer prices pick up more than expected in July, up by 0.5%
content: China's consumer prices rose by a more-than-expected 0.5% in July from a year ago, according to data from the National Bureau of Statistics on Friday.

title: Musk-Trump alliance: Why the onetime enemies are teaming up to try to win the White House

title: Jeremy Siegel backs off on calls for the Fed to do an emergency interest rate cut

title: India's Nifty 50 is outperforming the S&P 500 so far this year
